skillTree.name: Scourgerunner Chariot
skillTree.description: Dark Elf Beastmasters roam the wilds atop their dreaded chariots, armed with barbed nets and harpoons to slay the foe and ensnare their prey.

effects.description: Mount: Scourgerunner Chariot

skillTree.name: Manticore
skillTree.description: The roar of a Manticore is guaranteed to send mortals fleeing, for they know a creature of terror is abroad.

effects.description: Mount: Manticore

skillTree.name: Bracchus
skillTree.description: No creature outmatches the Black Dragon Bracchus in terms of sheer cruelty and the ability to inflict pain, save for Rakarth himself!

effects.description: Mount: Bracchus

skillTree.name: Sadistic
skillTree.description: There is great pleasure to be derived from the humiliation and suffering of others; this one has felt and revelled in it.

effects.description: Armour-piercing weapon damage: +25
Charge bonus: +5
Melee attack: +3

skillTree.name: Eternal Hatred
skillTree.description: The strength of this warrior's attack never wavers for an instance, such is the opprobrium felt for their hated High Elf cousins.

effects.description: Weapon strength: +10% when fighting against High Elves
Weapon strength: +6%

skillTree.name: Beast Tamer
skillTree.description: The honing of a Druchii's affinity with animals assures that the bestial ranks heed his imperious command with obedience.

effects.description:
Charge bonus: +15 for Cold One Knights, Cold One Dread Knights and Cold One Chariot units
	(Lord's army)

Charge bonus: +15 for Harpies, War Hydra, Kharibdyss, Sea Dragon, Black Dragon, Feral Manticore and Bloodwrack Medusae units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Ward of Khaine
skillTree.description: The Bloody-handed God watches over his disciples.

effects.description: Missile resistance: 10%

skillTree.name: Ward of Hekarti
skillTree.description: Magic's dark mistress has a care for her dutiful acolytes.

effects.description: Magic resistance: 10%

skillTree.name: Carrion Crows
skillTree.description: "Fly my pretties, fly!"

effects.description:
Armour-piercing weapon damage: +5 for Harpies units
	(Lord's army)

Income from raiding: +25%
	(Lord's army)

Income from post-battle loot: +25%
	(Lord's army)

No upkeep cost for Harpies units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Free-Range
skillTree.description: What need is there to feed creatures perfectly capable of feeding themselves?

effects.description: Casualty replenishment rate: +5% when in foreign territory

Enemy casualty replenishment rate: -10%
	(local enemy armies)

Public order: -8
	(local enemy province)

skillTree.name: Breeding Program
skillTree.description: "The Beastmasters were so preoccupied with whether or not they could, they didn't stop to think if they should."

effects.description:
Melee attack: +8 for War Hydra and Kharibdyss units
	(Lord's army)

Passive ability: "Abyssal Howl" for Hydra units
	(Lord's army)

Ability: "Frost Breath" for Kharibdyss units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Harpyclaw Bolts
skillTree.description: Extracting the claws of captive Harpies without suffering injury requires a control that few Beastmasters possess, but yields armaments most useful for beast-catching.

effects.description: Casualties captured post-battle: +25%
Increased chance monsters will be added to the Monster Pens while raiding, fighting battles, or occupying settlements

Scourgerunner Chariots and Reaper Bolt Throwers gain Harpyclaw ammunition, which reduces enemy movement speed on hit
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Pack Hunters
skillTree.description: "They're lethal at eight months, and I do mean lethal. I've hunted most things that can hunt you, but the way these things move…"

effects.description:
Ambush success chance: +25%
	(Lord's army)

Recruit rank: +3 for Cold One Knights, Cold One Dread Knights and Cold One Chariot units
	(all armies factionwide)

Attribute: Stalk for Feral Cold Ones, Cold One Knights, and Cold One Dread Knights
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Apex Predator
skillTree.description: In the wild, there is no such thing as good and evil, only predators and prey.

effects.description: Hidden effect to boost recruit rank of Monsters in the faction pool

Weapon strength: +10% for Sea Dragon and Black Dragon units
	(Lord's army)

Recruit rank: +3 for monstrous units
	(all armies factionwide)

Passive ability: "Murderous Prowess" for monstrous units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Only the Strongest Survive
skillTree.description: Feed the lesser stock to our war beasts; they have no place among the Druchii host.

effects.description:
Casualty replenishment rate: +10% for all monsters from Monsters Pens
	(all armies factionwide)

Unit capacity: +2
	all monsters from Monsters Pens

skillTree.name: Abundant Corpses
skillTree.description: The battles, sacked cities, and ferocious untamed beasts provide plenty of sustenance for the winged predators. The harpies know that food and spoils aplenty will be found in Rakarth's wake.

effects.description:
Speed: +10% for Harpies units
	(all armies factionwide)

Upkeep: -10% for Harpies units
	(all armies factionwide)

skillTree.name: Sea Dragon Cloak
skillTree.description: The tough, scaly hide of the Sea Dragon provides excellent protection against all manner of blows.

effects.description: Armour: +5
Missile resistance: 5%

skillTree.name: Devastating Charge
skillTree.description: Some creatures charge home with such fury that the very ground shakes beneath their feet.

effects.description: Charge bonus: +15
Charge bonus: +30

skillTree.name: Hard to Hit
skillTree.description: Hand-to-hand combat is a lethal match of cut and thrust. However, it’s not all about offensive strikes; parries and other defensive moves can also win the day.

effects.description: Melee defence: +6
Melee defence: +12

skillTree.name: Blade Master
skillTree.description: This warrior is one with their blade; it is an extension of their will, making them a worthy foe in combat.

effects.description: Melee attack: +6
Melee attack: +12

skillTree.name: Indomitable
skillTree.description: The iron will and indomitable presence of this leader ensures their followers remain steadfast when facing peril.

effects.description: Leadership: +6
Leadership: +12

skillTree.name: Foe-Seeker
skillTree.description: From one bloodied, lifeless corpse to the next, this one is always looking for the next adversary to best.

effects.description: Ability: "Foe-Seeker"

skillTree.name: Wound-Maker
skillTree.description: Such is their power and ferocity, a wound-maker will ravage the foe, cutting and pulverising until there is only one exit - death.

effects.description: Weapon strength: +10%
Weapon strength: +20%

skillTree.name: Full Plate Armour
skillTree.description: Full-Plate armour protects the wearer from head-to-foot. Many such suits are blessed or imbued with arcane abilities.

effects.description: Armour: +7
Armour: +15

skillTree.name: Blade Shield
skillTree.description: A blade that sings in defence will not let its wielder be penetrated.

effects.description: Melee defence: +6
Melee defence: +12

skillTree.name: Expeditious Endeavour
skillTree.description: What the enemy cannot see, it cannot hit. What the enemy cannot see, it cannot survive.

effects.description: Speed: +7%
Speed: +15%

skillTree.name: Beastslaver
skillTree.description: Beastmasters share their minions’ belligerence, cutting down foemen with lash, spear, and harpoon before claiming their twitching bodies as fodder.

effects.description: Ability: "Beastslaver"

skillTree.name: Inspiring Presence
skillTree.description: There are Lords that radiate power, confidence and fear, inspiring their followers to great or terrible acts.

effects.description: Character's aura leadership effect: +5

skillTree.name: Line Breaker
skillTree.description: Magic is a most useful tool on the field of battle, but generally secondary in the face of good, old-fashioned brute force.

effects.description:
Melee defence: +2 for Dreadspears, Bleakswords and Black Ark Corsairs units

skillTree.name: Sheafmaster
skillTree.description: Marshalling missile troops effectively - even elites - is all about timing.

skillTree.name: Raid Leader
skillTree.description: The most effective raiders have a plan that is certain to succeed and stick to it; this one ensures that they do.

skillTree.name: Lash Master
skillTree.description: Judicious, or even not-so-judicious, use of the lash tends to get the desired results, so why hold back?

skillTree.name: Knight Lord
skillTree.description: The ability to command the savage, untamed Cold Ones should not be underestimated - not everyone has the knack!

skillTree.name: Slaughterlord
skillTree.description: An elite even amongst elites, this accomplished warrior directs the cut-and-thrust of melee - a choreographer of death, you might say.

skillTree.name: Cull the Unworthy
skillTree.description: Those who fail to make the grade don't just die, they're tortured and used for target practice!

skillTree.name: Ravager Rewards
skillTree.description: You'd think that pillaging the land would bring payment enough. You'd be wrong.

skillTree.name: Favour the Fortunate
skillTree.description: The gods help those who help themselves - raising them above the rank and file to elite status.

skillTree.name: Confer Bloodlust
skillTree.description: The murderous, unforgiving rage of Khaine can be transferred from a Lord to his legions.

skillTree.name: Steel Will
skillTree.description: Some beasts are only tamed, or dominated, by some manner of being an order of magnitude stronger, in will if not in muscle.

skillTree.name: Route Marcher
skillTree.description: Those who know the land and its secrets will travel faster and further than the foes who don't.
